properties.title: Medway Park swimming pool
properties.description: Medway Park Leisure Centre, Mill Road, Gillingham, Kent, ME7 1HFTelephone 01634 336655Email medwaypark@medway.gov.ukWebsite http://www.medwaypark.org.uk/activities_facilities/swimming/Information Medway Park offers swimming facilities for all. Alongside the pools is a tiered seating area for spectators of recreational swim and competitive events. Facilities include: a 25-metre six-lane swimming pool; a segregated shallow section; a warm water teaching pool; a diving pool; a new state-of-the-art timing system; newly-refurbished and accessible changing facilities.

properties.title: Strand Leisure Pool
properties.description: Strand Leisure Pool And Park, Strand Approach Road, Gillingham, Kent, ME7 1TTTelephone 01634 852907Email medwaypark@medway.gov.ukWebsite http://www.medway.gov.uk/leisureandculture/leisurecentres/strandleisurepoolandpark/swimmingpools_strand.aspxInformation Strand Leisure Pool and Park is one of Medway's most popular outdoor attractions. The main pool has six 25-metre lanes opening out into a large fun pool. And, running around the outside the main pool, is England's largest lazy river, which is 300m in circumference. There is also a circular children's paddling pool. The pools are open from late May to early September.

properties.title: Hundred of Hoo swimming pool
properties.description: Hundred Of Hoo Swimming Pool, Main Road, Hoo St Werburgh, Rochester, Kent, ME3 9EYTelephone 01634 251588Email leisure@medway.gov.ukWebsite http://www.medway.gov.uk/leisureandculture/leisurecentres/hundredofhooleisurecentre/swimming_hoo.aspxInformation Hundred of Hoo Leisure Centre has two pools: a 25m swimming pool; a 10m teaching pool. Both pools have Roman design entrance steps for easy access and a pool-side hoist is available on request. There are various swim sessions to suit your needs: everyone can attend the general sessions; there are some adult-only sessions for the serious lane-swimmer; for some family swimming fun, enjoy the family-only sessions.

properties.title: Splashes Leisure Pool
properties.description: Splashes Leisure Pool, Bloors Lane, Rainham, Gillingham, Kent, ME8 7EGTelephone 01634 377509Email splashes.leisure@medway.gov.ukWebsite http://www.medway.gov.uk/leisureandculture/leisurecentres/splashesleisurecentre/splashesleisurepool.aspxInformation Splashes Leisure Pool has a wave machine, a flume, and a toddlers' pool. Six to 10-year-olds can join the Junior fins club for supervised water-based games and activities. And on Saturdays, the pool is exclusively available for children's birthday parties from 5.30 to 7.30pm. For low impact water aerobics, try Splashes' splashacise classes.

properties.title: Strood Leisure Centre swimming pool
properties.description: Strood Swimming Pool, Watling Street, Strood, Rochester, Kent, ME2 3JQTelephone 01634 723888Email leisure@medway.gov.ukWebsite http://www.medway.gov.uk/leisureandculture/leisurecentres/stroodleisurecentre/swimming_strood.aspxInformation Strood Leisure Centre has three pools; a 25-metre, eight-lane pool; a warm water teaching pool; a hydrotherapy pool. Strood Leisure Centre offers swimming lessons for all ages, including classes for parents and babies or toddlers.
